summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing a person referred to as 'petie' who has returned from Russia and is now in London. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended for the recipient only.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a personal matter regarding someone who has returned from Russia.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Jeffrey Epstein, indicating a personal or professional relationship.

keyFacts: The email discusses a person referred to as 'petie' who has just returned from Russia.
The email is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
The communication is intended only for the use of Jes Staley.
